articles.title: Afghanistan stars celebrate historic win vs Australia with team dance on Dwayne Bravo's iconic song 'Champion' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Afghanistan cricketers could be seen dancing to the tune of Dwayne Bravo's ‘Champion’ song after the side's historic win over Australia in T20 World Cup. | Crickit
articles.content: Afghanistan pulled off a stunning 21-run victory over Australia in the T20 World Cup, with Gulbadin Naibs four-wicket haul overshadowing Pat Cummins hat-trick in a memorable day for Afghan cricket. E… [+2283 chars]

articles.title: Hidden Antarctic mountain range revealed by pink sands in South Australia - WION
articles.description: Pink sands washing up on South Australian beaches have revealed a hidden secret of Earth's ancient past. Scientists have uncovered evidence of an ancient mountain range buried under the Antarctic ice, thanks to the discovery of a mineral called garnet at Petr…

articles.title: ‘That’s what I love about Rohit Sharma’: Aaron Finch praises captain for changing team’s batting style in T20 World Cup | Mint - Mint
articles.description: T20 World Cup 2024: Former Australia captain lauds India's Rohit Sharma for prioritising impact over personal milestones like fifties and hundreds in T20 cricket. He appreciated Rohit's fearless approach and leadership style in the ongoing T20 World Cup 2024.
articles.content: T20 World Cup 2024: After India secured a 50-run victory against Bnagladesh, Former Australia captain Aaron Finch has now praised India captain Rohit Sharma for changing the teams batting style in th… [+2689 chars]
